description: Should return false if both flags (useNativeSDK and useNativeSDKToSend) are not present
Should return false if useNativeSDKToSend is not present
Should return true if both flags (useNativeSDK and useNativeSDKToSend) are present and device mode is enabled
Should return false if both flags (useNativeSDK and useNativeSDKToSend) are present and set to true
Should return false if both flags (useNativeSDK and useNativeSDKToSend) are present but set to true
